name: MetroRace 2121X
description:
My entry for the second gotm jam!

This is an old-school Wipe-Out-inspired racing game, meant to emulate the PSX look (not too strictly).

Everything but the font was made by me :) (models, music, code, etc)
The font can be found here, by the way: https://www.fontspace.com/excluded-font-f43356

I'm uploading this late at night so more info will be available sometime tomorrow.

In short, Controls: Xbox-controller
Accelerate - Right trigger
"Handbrake"/"Drift" - Left trigger
Steering - Left joystick

Unfortunately did not have time to implement keyboard input. Apologies!

Hope you like it!
